subsection.name: What is OAI-PMH?
subsection.p: The Open Archives Initiative Protocol for Metadata Harvesting (referred to as the OAI-PMH in the remainder of this document) provides an application-independent interoperability framework based on metadata harvesting.
See also the PMH section at the Open Archives Initiative website.

subsection.name: Code base on GitHub
subsection.p: The code of this project is on GitHub at https://github.com/onehippo-forge/oai-pmh-provider/.

subsection.name: How can I use OAI-PMH provider in my project?
Supported versions and changes
subsection.p: The OAI-PMH plug-in has been build for hippo 7.8.3 and up.
Latest is plugin version 2.01.06 for Hippo 10.
